generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and trees.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multi-story residential buildings are visible on the right side of the road and partially on the left.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the road, and some bushes are visible near the buildings on the right.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the sidewalks and between the road and buildings.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible along the road, including one with a traffic sign.
- traffic sign: A yellow diamond-shaped warning sign is mounted on a pole on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, including a black car on the right and a dark-colored car on the left.
- truck: An orange truck is visible parked on the left side of the road in the distance.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
